title: It’s Amazon Prime Day—and here are links to everything awesome we could find
content:
"Until all deals are one." (credit: Hasbro / Paramount)

It's Prime Day! (No, unfortunately, not that Prime). Sales have officially begun, and today marks the first day of Amazon's event with deals on technology, home and health products, office essentials, and more, with many deals exclusive to Prime subscribers. We've rounded up some awesome sales on Apple, Alienware, and Asus in the computing space, Eero and TP-Link for smart networking devices, and brands such as Dyson, Samsung, Crucial, Sony, Logitech, and more! Amazon-owned brands like Blink, Echo, Kindle, Fire Tablets, and Fire TV also have their own discounts. So whether you're shopping for a smartwatch or a smart TV, be sure to check our curated list of deals below. We'll update this post frequently throughout the two-day Prime Day sale-a-thon, so check back regularly for new savings. As always, Prime deals change often, so shop early to lock in your price.

Apple's AirPods Pro, with their noise-cancelling and live-listening features, perform fairly well in tests against more traditional hearing aids. (credit: Jeff Dunn)
